title: FS: T206 Hof PSA and SGA -Matty, Brown, McGraw
author: jlynch1960

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Hof PSA and SGA -Matty, Brown, McGraw
posts.post_content:
Hi-

Only McGraw Cap left - price reduced to $175 including shipping but gift or add 3% for Paypal. 

Thanks 

Looking to convert cards into a new/old factory Targa hard top (for any Pcar fans out there).

Scanner sucks (some blurring/darkening) but you should get the general idea.  

Prices are what I paid for them (2 years back or so).   Looking to break even, but feel free to make a reasonable offer with the emphasis on reasonable; I'd rather hold them than sell at a loss.

Backs are good, but if you need a scan, PM me.

Matty white cap PSA 3 $396  SOLD
Matty port SGC 40 $365  SOLD
Brown port PSA 5 $375  SOLD
McGraw cap PSA 4 $195
McGraw hip PSA 2 Tolstoi $82  SOLD

Shipping included, but add 3% for Paypal

Thanks, Jim
Matty portrait is sold to Chris pending payment.

Matty white cap sold to Ron.  Thanks!

As I recall, the McGraw portrait was a BIN that was close to the VCP at the time so I just went for it and may have overpaid by a hair.  

Make me an offer on the McGraws (w/in reason of course).

Thanks, Jim
Email sent on the T206 McGraw hip PSA 2...l

Three fingers port is sold to BBsports in the (next door to the great state of NY) state of NJ.

McGraw hips is sold to Iggyman.  Rapist!  Cheapskate! It's your's to have and to hold until you flip it tomorrow or the day after next.  Just kidding, enjoy!

McGraw port chapeaux sur la tete will be given free to anyone who can prove direct lineal connection to the great man himself.  Must be certified by the ancient and honorable order of the Daughters of the Potato Famine in order to collect prize.  Void where prohibited.

How bout an offer instead.  

Regards.
Bump for new price on McGraw.
